START: ^“Kid, I just got a shipment of exotic silk worms from a far away friend and I’m stuck on deciding on how I should incorporate them into my farm.”
Cultivate: ^“Sir, the smaller boats gave us more materials to work with but I do think our fishing abilities have been limited.”
Crossbreed: ^“Sir, the boats that have sails seem to be working much better since we save more time traveing through the river.”
Pure: ^“Sir, the larger boats have taken up a lot of materials but we’ve been able to collect much more fish at a time because of it.”
